rpc.trackingDetails: ZAN Node Service generally does not store any kind of user information (e.g. IP address, location, requst location, request data, etc.) that transits through our RPCs except for one senario ——we may track your IP address when you are using our RPCs and will delete it immediately when you stoping using our RPCs. To learn more, please review our privacy policy at https://a.zan.top/static/Privacy-Policy.pdf

We do not collect request data or request origin. We only temporarily record the request method names and IP addresses for 7 days to ensure our service functionality such as load balancing and DDoS protection. All the data is automatically deleted after 7 days and we do not store any user information for longer periods of time. https://blockpi.io/privacy-policy
